value.title: StarCraft 2: LURKERS & NYDUS WORMS! (Rogue vs PartinG)
value.excerpt: An awesome game of Zerg versus Protoss in StarCraft 2 between the previous world champion Rogue and one of the strongest Protoss players PartinG. In this game we see a unique style to countering Lurkers and Nydus Worms from PartinG. He focuses heavily on Stalkers and Colossus, while denying the Nydus
